Literature.Title: Potential of novel antimicrobial peptide P3 from bovine erythrocytes and its analogs to disrupt bacterial membranes in vitro and display activity against drug-resistant bacteria in a mouse model.
Literature.Author: Zhang Q, Xu Y, Wang Q, Hang B, Sun Y, Wei X, Hu J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rabbit erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:7% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:8% Killing=100 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:12% Killing=200 µg/ml
